QuestData.Title: Unfair Trade
QuestData.Description: Though we have only just met, we have a common enemy: this group called the "Horde."$b$bSeveral days ago, their leader made us a trade offer. When we refused, his servants abducted several of our cubs as bargaining chips.$b$bWe have called in the Shado-Pan to help, but they are in Kun-Lai Summit, a journey of several days. Can you come to our aid?
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 8 Captive Pandaren Cubs from Twinspire Keep by slaying the demonic eyeballs that watch over them.
QuestData.CompletionText: Those poor, wee little cubs. Go, help 'em out, $n. Do what's right.
QuestData.RewardText: Aye, I seen the wee ones, too. Busted a few out on m'way up here.$b$bYe've done good, $glad:lass;. Those cubs might have some nasty nightmares, but they'll grow up some day, thanks to you.
